titleStmt.title: M. Dudley et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG4394

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: The undersigned citizens of Caldwell County state that they ^are^ well acquainted with Newman ^Estes^ Estes John him & William Wells ^& his associates^ the bail for the appearance of James A Johnson and against whom Judgment was rendered at the present Term, and that under the circumstances (said Johnson having been carried away by the Military Authorities whereby it was placed beyond their power to have him in Court) it would be in their opinion a great hardship to coerce payment from them and respectfully solicit your Excellency to remit said Judgment

M. Dudley
H. E. Ernshimer
M. M. Cash
John Wheatly
Jno W. Cash
W R Gray
Jno W Simpson
Seth B. Wigginton
W. S. Talbott. P. J. T. P.
